alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 1:07PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...Thunderstorms associated with Invest 91P will produce possible gusty winds and heavy showers through Friday... A weak tropical low (Invest 91P) south of Tutuila about 60 miles, will linger near the territory through Friday. This low may bring showers, heavy at times, with gusty west-northwesterly winds. The Joint Typhoon Warning Center (JTWC) does not see this tropical disturbance intensifying while near the territory. Additionally, Invest 91P is forecasted to track northeast and away from the territory by Friday. Westerly winds will be evident across north and west-facing villages, and they are higher around downslope valleys, such as the harbor area. Hence, a wind advisory has been issued throughout the day today. Furthermore, this unsettled weather will increase the potential for flash flooding during this period. We will continue to monitor for any flood advisories/warnings for American Samoa.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
